structure.unit: Registration Of Certain Professions And Occupations

law.catch_line: Genetic Counselors; License Applications; Fee; Proof Of Age, Moral Character, And Educational And Professional Requirements
law.text: An application for original license, license renewal or for the licensing examination shall be made on forms approved by the board and accompanied by the appropriate fee. The fee for original licenses and renewals shall be determined by the secretary of administration and finance. An applicant for original license shall be sworn and shall furnish satisfactory proof that he is at least 18 years old, of good moral character and has met the educational and professional experience requirements prerequisite to sitting for the licensing examination.
